description.narrative: IR 6.2 Effective & efficient management and stewardship of Financial resources throughout 2012.. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Component Results (PCR) 6 Effective & efficient programme management & ops support from 2009 through 2012

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: IR 6.2 Effective & efficient management and stewardship of Financial resources throughout 2012.
All of liquidation processed within a day
All of payments has been processed within 2 working days.
All operation and field offices expenses are covered and expended through %age allocation of resources from funds received.
All remittances managed and bank reconciliation reports submitted to Senior Management
